ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Couple of  questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... sow . ... warrior etc. ... and asks you for a sow, and you ask them whether they ve noticed what server they re on and that the odds of me sowing
ygData.messageBody:
>You're lucky you get a sentence demand ;) I usually just get a hail and
'sow'.
>Quite fun to play around with them for a bit 'I'm not a shaman I'm a
warrior' etc.
>The funniest times are when a lightie (I'm on a PvP server) comes up to you
and asks you for a >sow, and you ask them whether they've noticed what
server they're on and that the odds of me >sowing someone that could attack
a fellow guildy are roughly the same odds that I would go solo >Naggy. :)
>
Oh, I get "Hail Damita" and "sow" alot too.
LOL!
luv,
-Su

----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, May 13, 2002 8:38 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Couple of questions


> Go to Frontier Mountains, in Kunark, and get into a Giant Fort group.
Great
> exp, nice loot. Druids are always in demand -- "sow please."
>
Heh. You'll be lucky if you get a "please". I've found people just say
"can
I have sow". (now that my druid is able to sow). I had one guy come up and
bug me when I was turning in CB belts in Kaladim yesterday. He said "can I
have sow." I said "I can't cast that spell indoors". guy says "What are
you
giving him?" me: "Crushbone belts" guy "Can I have sow."
So I tried to cast it on him just to show it wouldn't work. then I told
him
the message. I was just about to camp. He's like "ok. tell me when you're
leaving so you can sow me."
I was thinking "would it kill the person to ask if I could go out and sow
him? or to say please?" That has been bothering me lately. Lack of
manners.
I've been casting sow on people before they can ask for it lately. they
hail
me and I cast it. Just so I won't have to be angry if they don't say
please.
Most of them say thanks at least.
anyhoo, I just camped right there and never said another word to the
person.
I was too tired to deal with it.
luv,
-Su
